name: Świąteczna Awaria
overview: Świąteczna awaria is an arcade platform game for up to three players. Mischievous penguin has stolen Santa's sleigh with gifts moments before Christmas. To save Christmas the player must collect the designated number of yellow packages, avoiding penguins, birds, wastebaskets, computers and other hostile creatures. In addition to jumping ability each of the three main characters (Santa, snowman, bear) has a unique temporarily stunning weapon (star, snow ball, colorful ball) and may use numerous power ups (long jumping, extra weapon, shield, fast running, temporary paralysis of all opponents). Occasionally defeated enemy pops up a green package. Gathering it moves to one of two timed mini-games: find two same pictures and find one designated picture. Passing a mini-game is rewarded with an extra life. Originally released as a coverdisk\covermount for Amiga Computer Studio 2/98 in Poland. It was eventually released worldwide in 2008.
